content: with this pattern you can make your own puddle slime or yolky slime from slime rancher i don t know exact amount of yards needed but this pattern does not need much yarn at all there is only one size but theoretically you could make it larger pretty easily with some custom adjustments materials * g-6 4 00mm hook * yarn needle optional but handy for weaving in ends * #4 medium weight yarn aran/worsted in either blue or yellow light yellow and white * stuffing * 8mm safety eyes stitches used * magic_ring/circle or chain depending on how you choose to start * single_crochet * increase * decrease yarn used in pictures puddle slime - big twist value solids in cornflower blue yolky slime - mainstays 100% acrylic in yellow big twist value solids in pale yellow and big twist value solids in white
